short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prepends <title> with [L] for sites running on localhost.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prepends <title> with [L] for sites running on localhost. Just a quick glance at the tab name to see whether it's production or localhost. No tab-switching, no worries.
